page.title: 13 Silverton school
page.content:
Silverton school was opened in 1975 by the Bishop of Exeter, the Rev.E.Mercer.
Silverton School has one hundred and nineteen pupils in four classes: Class 1: (5/6 yrs) Mrs Garner Class 2: (6/8 yrs) Mrs Thomas Class 3: (8/10 yrs) Miss Barton, D.Hd. Class 4: (9/11 yrs) Mr Fieldsend, Head and Mrs Piney, Infant Helper, 0.5 and Miss Buzzacott, teacher, 0.3 of a week.
The school secretary is Mrs Carroll. Our school cooks are Mrs Bibey and Cicely Gooding. Margaret Jefferson and Margaret Gooding help out at dinner time. The school is cleaned by Mrs Langdon and Mrs Dolman.
